headline: A Boy From Louisiana, A New York Favorite Son
abstract: Manning’s 16-season N.F.L. career began with him orchestrating a draft-day trade to the Giants and ended with him choosing to retire rather than play elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Huddled in the stands during the waning moments of the Giants’ regular season finale last month, as the last seconds ticked off in yet another disastrous Giants season — the team’s sixth losing campaign in seven years — Giants fans sought succor in a memory.
